
```{r}
x <- rnorm(1000, 100, 20)
y <- rnorm(1000, 90, 20)
dat <- data.frame(x, y)
```

```{r}
dat
```

```{r}
ggplot(dat) +
  geom_histogram(aes(x = x), color = "red", position = "identity") + 
  geom_histogram(aes(x = y), color = "green", position = "identity")
```
